Plot: In the 1960s, three sisters form a girl group and soon become local sensations with major label interest, but fame becomes a challenge as the close-knit family begins to fall apart.
Title: Sparkle
Writer: Mara Brock Akil (screenplay), Joel Schumacher (story), Howard Rosenman (story)
Actors: Jordin Sparks, Whitney Houston, Derek Luke, Mike Epps
tomatoConsensus: While undeniably melodramatic and old-fashioned, Sparkle transcends its formulaic trappings thanks to Salim Akil's empathetic direction and strong performances from a committed cast.
